channel.title: Yahoo Maps on Matthew Keelan
channel.description: Recent content in Yahoo Maps on Matthew Keelan

item.title: Goodbye, Yahoo Maps
item.description:
I have used Yahoo Maps for as long as I can remember. Without it I would have had trouble getting places. Today, annoyed that my search criteria has not been remember the last few times I’ve searched for it, I decided to go edit my locations and add the new one. I then noticed that Yahoo has decided to limit the number of saved locations to 10, for no reason.

The fact that I didn’t want to have to copy over the collection of saved locations I’ve built up has kept me from switching away from Yahoo Maps, but now I will switch to Google Maps. I will no longer have to endure Yahoo’s new obnoxious, slow Flash interface which it keeps forcing on me, and can now enjoy Google’s new quick AJAX interface.

Thanks Yahoo, Good Bye.
